comment: She's one of the few professors that understands that students have lives outside of classes. Especially when they're taking online courses.. So, instead of making discussions due each week, she allows everyone to do them at their own convenience as long as it is done by a certain date at the end of the semester. Great teacher.

Prof. Green is wonderful! Her online course was pretty straightforward, and consisted of a few open-book tests, a couple papers, and discussion boards, all fairly easy. Reading the book wasn't necessary, but I did use it on the exams. She responds to emails and questions very quickly. Taking her again for LDRS 3000. I definitely recommend her!

Prof Green is so nice! Her class is super easy. She has a lot of discussion posts but leaves them open all semester and you basically just have to write a sentence and she will give you a 100. She always leaves positive feedback on all assignments and actually reads the papers you write, but she still always gives 100s. Take her for a gpa booster!

Professor Green is great!  She opens up the discussion boards the whole semester and you basically have the whole semester to finish.  Tests are not hard and she doesn't post much.  She is very accessible via e-mail. The list of books she gives for the book review are all very interesting.  I really enjoyed taking her class.

This had to be the easiest class I have ever taken. She grades very lenient, so unless you completely don't write on topic, it's almost a for sure A. She was a very nice lady, and would always be ready to help you.
Enjoyed the class and the professor. It was an average amount of papers and grading wasn't too harsh.
Sweet lady I would take her class again! Not hard at all an easy A!8
Best professor I've had at KSU. Nicest little lady ever!! Easy grader--as long as you do the assignment, you'll most likely get an A.
She is a wonderful person and professor. I would take her again. She is the most caring and helpful person I have met at kennesaw.

She is a very nice lady. She is very knowledgeable and I can honestly say that I actually learn something in the class that I did not know before. she makes sure she answers any questions that anyone has and also gives good suggestions.
took her for reading regents prep. she was helpful but didn't make the class interesting enough. she's ok.

Had her as my administrator in Woodstock High--she was the administrator. Now have her in English,... how odd. nice lady. but serious. likes english. clear. Choose this lady if u want to work hard for an A. Dont buy Text book... waste of money

Ms. Green is a very nice person, but is not very knowledgeable at all where preparing for the Compass is concerned. All said, she is new to the campus, but her teaching style lacks confidence and value. Did lots of essays but not enough proofing to prepare for Compass. Attendence not mandatory, but points deducted for missed classes.
